title: Saint Croix National Scenic Riverway: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        The St. Croix River flows through the river valley. NPS/Eret       The Park The St. Croix and Namekagon rivers are open year-round for you to explore.    High water conditions may require rangers to close stretches of the rivers. Watch for alerts and check the current conditions. Winter snows often limit access to landings, trails, and campsites. Quiets hours are from 10:00 pm to 6:00 am.  Visitor Centers         St. Croix River Visitor Center Open daily, 9:00 am to 5:00 pm April 9 through October, 2016          Namekagon River Visitor Center Open daily, 9:00 am to 5:00 pm May 27 through Labor Day, 2016      Headquarters  Open Monday through Friday, 9:00 am to 4:30 pm Offices are open during the closed season for the visitor center. Access to offices should be prearranged or call 715-483-3284.
